title: Calories in Soft Serve Ice Cream
meta_description: Learn calories in softy ice cream per 100g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sugars, and full nutrition facts for better tracking.
h1: Calories in Soft Serve Ice Cream
assumptions: Vanilla soft serve ice cream, standard dairy-based, no toppings or mix-ins; approximate values from common recipes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, fat content, and serving size. Check product labels for precise info.

quick_answer.text: 100g of soft serve ice cream has about 200 calories, mainly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in softy ice cream per serving?
faqs.a: About 200 calories in 100g of standard soft serve ice cream.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in softy ice cream?
faqs.a: Around 23g carbs per 100g, mostly from sugars at 21g.

faqs.q: Is softy ice cream high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 11g total fat per 100g, with 7g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Calories in chocolate softy ice cream?
faqs.a: Similar to vanilla, about 200-220 kcal per 100g, depending on recipe.

faqs.q: How does soft serve compare to regular ice cream?
faqs.a: Softer texture with air incorporation; calories are comparable, around 200 kcal/100g.
